Simile provides AI-driven solutions that help eCommerce stores boost conversions and transform the overall shopping experience.
Download our extension to experience a demo of what Simile can do for your online store. Simile offers 4 main features:
1. Similar Upsell: AI-generated product suggestions that are visually similar to the one being viewed
2. Product Bundles: ‘Frequently Bought Together’ product bundles based off your store’s order history to encourage impulse purchases
3. Visual Search: New way to search for products using your customers’ photos.
4. Personalization: Tailored recommendations to your customers based on their browsing behaviour
Together, these features enable a more dynamic product discovery across your store and will boost sales as a result!
